mapper.select: SELECT id_codigo_proceso_switch AS idcodigoprocesoswitch , descripcion AS descripcion , abreviatura AS abreviatura , id_clase_transaccion AS idclasetransaccion , id_codigo_transaccion AS idcodigotransaccion , txn_monetaria AS transaccionmonetaria , aplica_interes AS aplicainteres FROM MAE_CODIGO_PROCESO_SWITCH
